data.name: LeHweng LeHweng
data.detailed_description:
ANNOUNCEMENTS

There's no legal problem with the game, so please refrain from making false reports.


About the Game

LeHweng LeHewng is a rogue-lite platformer with unique actions that only click. The same map doesn't just change the order and placement, but it offers a whole new level of content every stage. Actions can vary depending on the user's creativity. You have to make the right choice in a short time. You need to use the items tactically.
data.about_the_game:
LeHweng LeHewng is a rogue-lite platformer with unique actions that only click.

The same map doesn't just change the order and placement, but it offers a whole new level of content every stage.

Actions can vary depending on the user's creativity.
You have to make the right choice in a short time.
You need to use the items tactically.
data.short_description: platformer with unique actions that only click.

  • Storage: 100 MB available space
